about_the_game:
The ants have lost their queen; help them find a new one! Armed with toys, explosives, and other items, think fast, draw lines to command your ants, and protect your queen from the hordes of enemy insects looking to put an early end to their rule in this funny but brutal escort tower defense game.

.
Draw lines to use your ants! Each ant is special and has unique abilities, from blocking paths to bouncing enemies around, with 14 ant types to play around with, there is so much to discover.


Be careful! From flying high above to nullifying your defenses, enemies have different tricks up their sleeves!


The goal you are defending is always moving! Protect your queen by escorting them through different levels. Make sure to watch out, they have a mind of their own, can go wherever, and will get into trouble if left unchecked. From a corgi to a set of ducklings, and even Martin, the automatic vacuum, each queen brings something new to the table.

name: Go! Save The Queen!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
